name: booklore
description: Booklore is a self-hosted app for managing and tracking your reading lists. It allows users to log books, mark them as read or unread, add ratings and reviews, and access the library via a simple, responsive web UI.
features: Reading Lists: Manage and track your reading with custom lists. Organized reading.
Read/Unread Status: Mark books as read or add to reading queue. Track progress.
Ratings & Reviews: Add personal ratings and detailed reviews. Remember your thoughts.
Responsive UI: Clean interface works beautifully on all devices. Access anywhere.
Library Management: Organize your entire book collection. Complete cataloging.
Search & Filter: Find books quickly with advanced filtering. Instant discovery.
Self-Hosted: Keep your reading data completely private. Full control.
Simple Setup: Easy deployment and configuration. Start quickly.
